name: Economic Rural Development Society
briefDescription: ERDS came into existence in the year 1982. The urge to set up ERDS was lent by the growing poverty in villages and also in the urban areas. It is a non-profit, secular and non-political organization dedicated to ameliorate the misery and privation of the downtrodden people. It started its journey humbly in Boral, (South 24 Parganas), Vikahar, (Dakshin Dinajpur), and Thinagar, Gajole and Habibpur (Malda). ERDS has diversified its activities in various directions, women & child development, Health & Nutrition, Low Cost Sanitation, Care & rehabilitation of the elderly people, Micro-credit, Skill development training, Child trafficking, International relationship and publication. 50000 people is being served by ERDS.
